forum.content: It's so cold, but I still want to find u, u don't need to look good, but u must have some skills. And I hope that who really know me, if u see my profile, and really know what I type, maybe u are the one who I look for.
forum.title: Want to find my teddy , who can hug me whwn i sleep.(｡ŏ﹏ŏ)
